themes_explored.verification_vindicated: Lira's sacrifice proved necessary. Harvesters departed. Silence protected.
themes_explored.last_witness: Zara's death ends living memory. Ansible becomes mythology.
themes_explored.generational_transition: Born-silent generation now tells stories to next generation who'll tell descendants.
themes_explored.alone_and_free: No guidance means freedom and responsibility intertwined.

mood: Climactic validation. Relief and grief intertwined. Celebration of survival shadowed by Zara's death. Satisfaction that sacrifice was worth it. Philosophical about permanent isolation. Acceptance of alone-ness. Quiet transition from one era to another. Not triumphant but satisfied. Not joyful but validated. Bittersweet completion.
pacing: Tense opening with Harvester arrival. Methodical scan sequence building suspense. Relief when classification is non-threat. Immediate shift to grief with Zara's death. Reflective memorial composition. Threadkeeper farewell. Quiet ending acknowledging new era of isolation. Climax and denouement combined.
chapter_purpose: CLIMAX - Harvester arrival and passage. Scan humanity. Classify non-threat. Depart. Validate 65 years of isolation. Zara dies after witnessing survival (last ansible witness). Threadkeepers depart. Humanity alone permanently. Era transition complete. All major threats resolved. Setup Book 3 resolution showing long-term consequences of permanent isolation.
